result.execSummary:
The defendant Edwin O. Schoening was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Edwin O. Schoening is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Edwin O. Schoening was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine/costs/attorney fees due by continued payment plan of $75.00 a month due the 1st of each month until paid in full. Failure to pay 1 day jail for every $25 owed.

records.addlTxt: Plea hearing at 03-29-2016 09:15 am
Court orders absolute sobriety.  No possession/consumption of any intoxicants.  Not to possess or consume controlled substances or prescription medication w/out a valid prescription.

Defendant Edwin O. Schoening in court.  Shannon M. Whitworth appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court advises of penalties and finds probable cause. Defendant does not qualify for public defender representation. Affidavit of Indigency filed for court to appoint counsel. Court does not find defendant inidgent but will appoint counsel. Defendant to pay $75 a month beginning 3/1/16. State recommends $500 signature bond.  Plea hearing scheduled for March 29, 2016 at 09:15 am.
